forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain with some snow mixing in overnight. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 33F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 6C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
